metadata.title: CVE-2024-40994 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ptp: fix integer overflow in max_vclocks_storeOn 32bit systems, the "4 * max" multiply can overflow.  Use kcalloc()to do the allocation to prevent this.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
